title: The Short Stories of Katherine Mansfield. AZW3, EPUB, MOBI
description:
The Short Stories of Katherine Mansfield - Katherine Mansfield, AZW3, EPUB, MOBI 35 Stories. Tags: Classics, Fiction, Short Stories

The short story is often viewed as an inferior relation to the Novel. But it is an art in itself. To take a story and distil its essence into fewer pages while keeping character and plot rounded and driven is not an easy task. Many try and many fail. 

Considered one of the greatest short story writers of her generation, Katherine Mansfield was a modernist writer from New Zealand. This collection includes thirty-five of her most popular stories.

Katherine Mansfield was a compulsive writer. Three volumes of her stories appeared in her short lifetime. Her work has been translated into 26 languages, and in 1988, the centennial of her birth, five international conferences focused on her life and work.
